reviewText: Raging Bull!!! Rocky!!!! The Usual Suspects!!!. 3 great movies in one Blu-Ray set. If you haven't seen these films, then your wrong! So I'm not gonna review this set on the merit of the movies,  because their just awesome. I will explain what your gonna get from it. I'm speaking to the Blu-Ray/DVD collectors junkies out there. If your looking for special features or booklets, your gonna be sadden. The only movie in the set with all it's current special features is Raging Bull. The other two (Rocky & The Usual Suspects) only come with trailers. If your just looking to own these 3 great films but don't care for much else, then this set is for you. Enjoy
